## Open Hardware

### \- Custom Laptop
 - Print your own [pi-top [3]](https://www.adafruit.com/product/3762?gclid=EAIaIQobChMI6qyR87ms5gIVkpOzCh3JXgeMEAYYASABEgKdhvD_BwE)

### \- Lapdock + Portable SoC Board

* [Nexdock 2]() 
* ROC-RK3328-CC (Renegade)
  * 4gb DDR4
  * 4 ARM Cortex-A53 @ 1.4GHz
  * [ARM Mali-450 MP4](https://www.notebookcheck.net/ARM-Mali-450-MP4.116281.0.html)
